name: Brave Furries
description: The Furries Princess has been kidnapped! Help these hilariously cute creatures execute a rescue mission. You will need to explore the Evil Wizard's castle and solve his puzzles to succeed. Hours of mildly brain-teasing gameplay awaits!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Any Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphic card Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Any Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Seperate graphics card Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
